name: h3
description: The Marucci Lindy12 Torpedo Pro Maple Wood Bat is a masterful redesign of the LINDY12 Pro Exclusive, tailored for enhanced barrel performance. By strategically shifting mass into the sweet spot, it maximizes force on contact, making it a powerhouse for hitters. Inspired by Marucci Athlete Francisco Lindor, this bat boasts a unique bell knob with a slightly flared and rounded end, complemented by a thin handle and innovative torpedo barrel for a slightly end-loaded feel. Upgraded to the PRO-X finish, with Francisco Lindor's signature engraved on the barrel, this handcrafted bat is ideal for seasoned players seeking peak performance. Certified with a Big League-grade ink dot and backed by an extended 60-day warranty, it's crafted in the USA from top-quality maple and bone-rubbed for ultimate wood density. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 30 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
